description: Try our easy to follow Marmalade-Glazed Veggies & Chipotle Sausages recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Brussels sprout,Sausage,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Marmalade-Glazed Veggies & Chipotle Sausages Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine marmalade, mustard, curry powder, vinegar and 2 tbs oil in a large roasting pan. Arrange carrot in a single layer. Scatter over onion and bake for 15 minutes or until carrot has just softened and is warmed through.

Add broccoli and sausages and toss to coat with the glaze. Drizzle over remaining oil and bake for a further 12 minutes or until sausages are cooked through. Remove from oven and change setting to grill on high. Add brussels sprouts to pan and grill for 5 minutes or until sausages are golden and sprouts are slightly charred. Serve with basil leaves scattered over.
